summary: The diff implements most of the requested requirements well, including backend Motoko actor with all data types and CRUD operations, frontend pages for all five sections, admin panel with PIN-based access, navigation, and component structure. However, a few requirements have gaps or cannot be fully confirmed from the available diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Study material items should be filterable by subject/category on the listing page.
missing_requirements.reason: The StudyMaterialCard component and AddStudyMaterialForm exist, but no StudyMaterialPage file is included in the visible diff to confirm subject filtering/tab UI is implemented on the listing page.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero background image must be generated and served from frontend/public/assets/generated as hero-background.dim_1440x600.png.
missing_requirements.reason: No image file (hero-background.dim_1440x600.png) appears in the diff under frontend/public/assets/generated. The HomePage file is among the omitted files, so usage cannot be confirmed either.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity (II) login integration via useInternetIdentity hook and AuthClient.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states user authentication/login for visitors is a non-goal. A full Internet Identity auth flow with AuthClient, DelegationIdentity, and login/clear functions was implemented but not requested.
